name: workflow-agents
description: Automated development workflow agents for GitHub issue-to-merge automation

agents.name: issue-manager
agents.description: Create and validate GitHub issues from incoming requests

agents.name: prep-agent
agents.description: Set up development environment and branch for a GitHub issue

agents.name: implementer-agent
agents.description: Implement solutions and create PRs from prepared environments

agents.name: reviewer-agent
agents.description: Perform code review and post detailed comments on PRs

agents.name: fixer-agent
agents.description: Apply fixes for review comments and iterate until approved

agents.name: validator-agent
agents.description: Run final validations and auto-merge approved PRs

agents.name: closer-agent
agents.description: Close GitHub issues with summary and PR links after merge

agents.name: orchestrator
agents.description: Supervise and coordinate the automated development workflow
